scripts.postinstall: sh -c 'mkdir -p public/vendor && if [ -f node_modules/@supabase/supabase-js/dist/umd/supabase.min.js ]; then cp node_modules/@supabase/supabase-js/dist/umd/supabase.min.js public/vendor/supabase.min.js; else cp node_modules/@supabase/supabase-js/dist/umd/supabase.js public/vendor/supabase.min.js; fi'
